dp:metadata.dc:title: JR 06 - Without Fail (2002)
dp:metadata.dc:creator: Lee Child
dp:metadata.dc:description: Skilled, cautious, and anonymous, Jack Reacher is perfect for the job: to assassinate the vice president of the United States. Theoretically, of course. A female Secret Service agent wants Reacher to find the holes in her system, and fast - because a covert group already has the vice president in their sights. They've planned well. There's just one thing they didn't plan on: Reacher.
